title: Case Study: Formalizing Grug's Jellyfish Merkle Tree with Quint
excerpt: Case study written with my colleagues Gabriela and Josef for [0]. A technical exploration of formally specifying the Jellyfish Merkle Tree data structure using Quint. We break down the space-efficient sparse Merkle tree implementation originally designed for Left Curve's [1], translating its complex operations into formal specifications for better understanding and verification.

title: Case Study: Using Model-Based Testing with Quint to Secure Neutron's Liquidity Pool Migration
excerpt: Case study written with my colleague Ivan for [0]. How we used formal specification and model-based testing to verify the correctness of a critical liquidity pool migration for [1], the first consumer chain on Cosmos Hub. A deep dive into applying Quint for protocol verification in production systems.
